rationale: The segment discusses budget cuts, not the inherent qualities of the threat using intensifiers and risk-adjectives.
statement_text: Remember, when I walked in last year, a week before the end of the fiscal year, at that point the budget proposed by the House was cutting the NIAID budget by 23.9%. We were the only NIH institute [being cut]. That [being the only NIH institute being cut] is what I walked into.
